members.name: connectToService
members.description: Tries to connect to the  Chrome's custom tabs service. you must call this method before calling any of the other methods listed below.

members.name: warmUp
members.description: Call this method whenever there's a chance the user will open an external url.

members.name: mayLaunchUrl
members.description: For even better performance optimization, call this methods if there's more than a 50% chance the user will open a certain URL.
